reviews.text: Just completing my third project with Leslie G. Each window has turned out exactly as I hoped and often even better. Leslie listened very well for my wishes and style, asked me meaningful questions, and offered suggestions and improvements on my thinking based on her knowledge of the products and installation. I love The Shade Store and think it is worth every penny spent to get expert results, from selection to measurement to installation and follow up. Great team and service all the way throug

Dan was exceptionally helpful and friendly when I was looking at honeycomb cellular shades, and explained the motorized options. I look forward to working with them for my estimate to replace my builder's blinds.

I highly recommend Patrice at The Shade Store in Southlake. Her level of customer service far exceeded my expectations! She took the time to help me select the perfect fabric and style of shades for my casual dining area, and she was always very responsive when I had questions throughout the process. It is very obvious that she truly cares about her customers and strives to provide the best customer service possible!  My new window shades were exactly as promised and were delivered on time. The
